SEARCH
Package com.example.cmput301_team_project.db

Class FirebaseAuthenticationService

java.lang.Object
com.example.cmput301_team_project.db.FirebaseAuthenticationService
public class FirebaseAuthenticationService extends Object
the FirebaseAuthenticationServices singleton class includes methods for handling user authentication via Firebase Authentication. Provides methods on registering a new user, logging in and signing out the existing authenticated user, and getting the authenticated user's display name.

  • Method Details

    • setUserForTesting

      public void setUserForTesting(String user)

    • getInstance

      public static FirebaseAuthenticationService getInstance()

    • setInstanceForTesting

      public static void setInstanceForTesting(com.google.firebase.auth.FirebaseAuth mAuth)
      Sets up an instance of the FirebaseAuthenticationService for testing purposes.
      Parameters:
      mAuth - the FirebaseAuth to be added to the test Authenticators instance.

    • registerUser

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<String> registerUser(String username, String password)
      Registers a new user with Firebase Authentication with a randomly generated email, with the username set as the display name.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the newly registered user.
      password - The password of the newly registered user.
      Returns:
      A Task containing the user's generated email as a String if successful. If the task was not successful, then return a null String and an exception.

    • loginUser

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<com.google.firebase.auth.AuthResult> loginUser(String email, String password)
      Logs in the user based on their email and password.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user logging in.
      password - the password to authenticate the user logging in.
      Returns:
      A task containing the FirebaseAuth of the user. if authentication fails then an exception is thrown instead.

    • logoutUser

      public void logoutUser()
      Logs out the currently authenticated user from the Firebase Authentication.

    • getCurrentUser

      public String getCurrentUser()
      Gets the authenticated user's display name from Firebase Authentication.
      Returns:
      The display name of the Authenticated user as a String.
